verses.verse: Follow <S%G1377><s%> after charity, <S%G26><s%> and desire <S%G2206><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> gifts, but rather <S%G3123><s%> that you may prophesy. <S%G4395><s%>

For he that speaks <S%G2980><s%> in an unknown tongue <S%G1100><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> not to men, <S%G444><s%> but to God: <S%G2316><s%> for no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> understands <S%G191><s%> him; however, in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> mysteries. <S%G3466><s%>
But he that prophesies <S%G4395><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> to men <S%G444><s%> to edification, <S%G3619><s%> and exhortation, <S%G3874><s%> and comfort. <S%G3889><s%>
He that speaks <S%G2980><s%> in an unknown tongue <S%G1100><s%> edifies <S%G3618><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%> but he that prophesies <S%G4395><s%> edifies <S%G3618><s%> the church. <S%G1577><s%>

I would <S%G2309><s%> that you all <S%G3956><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>but rather <S%G3123><s%> that you prophesied: <S%G4395><s%> for greater <S%G3187><s%> is he that prophesies <S%G4395><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> he that speaks <S%G2980><s%> with tongues, <S%G1100><s%> except <S%G1622><s%> <S%G1508><s%> he interpret, <S%G1329><s%> that the church <S%G1577><s%> may receive <S%G2983><s%> edifying. <S%G3619><s%>

Now, <S%G3570><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> to you speaking <S%G2980><s%> with tongues, <S%G1100><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I profit <S%G5623><s%> you, except <S%G3362><s%> I shall speak <S%G2980><s%> to you either <S%G2228><s%> by revelation, <S%G602><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> by knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> by prophesying, <S%G4394><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> by doctrine? <S%G1322><s%>

And even <S%G3676><s%> things without <S%G895><s%> life <S%G895><s%> giving <S%G1325><s%> sound, <S%G5456><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> pipe <S%G836><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> harp, <S%G2788><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> they give <S%G1325><s%> a distinction <S%G1293><s%> in the sounds, <S%G5353><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall it be known <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is piped <S%G832><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> harped? <S%G2789><s%>
For if <S%G1437><s%> the trumpet <S%G4536><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> an uncertain <S%G82><s%> sound, <S%G5456><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> shall prepare <S%G3903><s%> himself to the battle? <S%G4171><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> you, except <S%G3362><s%> you utter <S%G1325><s%> by the tongue <S%G1100><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> easy <S%G2154><s%> to be understood, <S%G2154><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall it be known <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is spoken? <S%G2980><s%> for you shall speak <S%G2980><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the air. <S%G109><s%>

There are, it may be, so <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> kinds <S%G1085><s%> of voices <S%G5456><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and none <S%G3762><s%> of them is without <S%G880><s%> signification. <S%G880><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> not the meaning <S%G1411><s%> of the voice, <S%G5456><s%> I shall be to him that speaks <S%G2980><s%> a barbarian, <S%G915><s%> and he that speaks <S%G2980><s%> shall be a barbarian <S%G915><s%> to me.

Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> you, for as much <S%G1893><s%> as you are zealous <S%G2207><s%> of spiritual <S%G4151><s%> gifts, seek <S%G2212><s%> that you may excel <S%G4052><s%> to the edifying <S%G3619><s%> of the church. <S%G1577><s%>
Why <S%G1355><s%> let him that speaks <S%G2980><s%> in an unknown tongue <S%G1100><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> that he may interpret. <S%G1329><s%>
For if <S%G1437><s%> I pray <S%G4336><s%> in an unknown tongue, <S%G1100><s%> my spirit <S%G4151><s%> prays, <S%G4336><s%> but my understanding <S%G3563><s%> is unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> is it then? <S%G3767><s%> I will pray <S%G4336><s%> with the spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and I will pray <S%G4336><s%> with the understanding <S%G3563><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> I will sing <S%G5567><s%> with the spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and I will sing <S%G5567><s%> with the understanding <S%G3563><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

Else <S%G1893><s%> when <S%G1437><s%> you shall bless <S%G2127><s%> with the spirit, <S%G4151><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall he that occupies <S%G378><s%> the room <S%G5117><s%> of the unlearned <S%G2399><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> Amen <S%G281><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> your giving of thanks, <S%G2169><s%> seeing <S%G1894><s%> he understands <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G5101><s%> you say? <S%G3004><s%>
For you truly <S%G3303><s%> give thanks <S%G2168><s%> well, <S%G2573><s%> but the other <S%G2087><s%> is not edified. <S%G3618><s%>
I thank <S%G2168><s%> my God, <S%G2316><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> than you all: <S%G3956><s%>

Yet <S%G235><s%> in the church <S%G1577><s%> I had rather <S%G2309><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> with my understanding, <S%G3563><s%> that by my voice I might teach <S%G2727><s%> others <S%G243><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> ten <S%G3463><s%> thousand <S%G3463><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> in an unknown tongue. <S%G1100><s%>

Brothers, <S%G80><s%> be not children <S%G3813><s%> in understanding: <S%G5424><s%> however, <S%G235><s%> in malice <S%G2549><s%> be you children, <S%G3515><s%> but in understanding <S%G5424><s%> be men. <S%G5046><s%>

In the law <S%G3551><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> With men of other <S%G2084><s%> tongues <S%G2084><s%> and other <S%G2087><s%> lips <S%G5491><s%> will I speak <S%G2980><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> people; <S%G2992><s%> and yet for all <S%G3779><s%> that will they not hear <S%G1522><s%> me, said <S%G3004><s%> the LORD. <S%G2962><s%>

Why <S%G5620><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> are for a sign, <S%G4592><s%> not to them that believe, <S%G4100><s%> but to them that believe <S%G571><s%> not: but prophesying <S%G4394><s%> serves not for them that believe <S%G571><s%> not, but for them which believe. <S%G4100><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> be come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> place, and all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and there come <S%G1525><s%> in those that are unlearned, <S%G2399><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unbelievers, <S%G571><s%> will they not say <S%G2046><s%> that you are mad? <S%G3105><s%>

But if <S%G1437><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> and there come <S%G1525><s%> in one <S%G5100><s%> that believes <S%G571><s%> not, or <S%G2228><s%> one unlearned, <S%G2399><s%> he is convinced <S%G1651><s%> of all, <S%G3956><s%> he is judged <S%G350><s%> of all: <S%G3956><s%>

And thus <S%G3779><s%> are the secrets <S%G2927><s%> of his heart <S%G2588><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> manifest; <S%G5318><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> falling <S%G4098><s%> down on <S%G1909><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> he will worship <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and report <S%G518><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> is in you of a truth. <S%G3689><s%>

How <S%G5101><s%> is it then, <S%G3767><s%> brothers? <S%G80><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you come <S%G4905><s%> together, <S%G4905><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one of you has <S%G2192><s%> a psalm, <S%G5568><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a tongue, <S%G1100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a revelation, <S%G602><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> an interpretation. <S%G2058><s%> Let all <S%G3956><s%> things be done <S%G1096><s%> to edifying. <S%G3619><s%>

If <S%G1535><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man speak <S%G2980><s%> in an unknown tongue, <S%G1100><s%> let it be by two, <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> at the most <S%G4119><s%> by three, <S%G5140><s%> and that by course; <S%G3313><s%> and let one <S%G1520><s%> interpret. <S%G1329><s%>

But if <S%G1437><s%> there be no <S%G3361><s%> interpreter, <S%G1328><s%> let him keep <S%G4601><s%> silence <S%G4601><s%> in the church; <S%G1577><s%> and let him speak <S%G2980><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> and to God. <S%G2316><s%>
Let the prophets <S%G4396><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three, <S%G5140><s%> and let the other <S%G243><s%> judge. <S%G1252><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> any thing be revealed <S%G601><s%> to another <S%G243><s%> that sits <S%G2521><s%> by, let the first <S%G4413><s%> hold <S%G4601><s%> his peace. <S%G4601><s%>

For you may <S%G1410><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> one <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> by one, <S%G1520><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> may learn, <S%G3129><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> may be comforted. <S%G3870><s%>
And the spirits <S%G4151><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> are subject <S%G5293><s%> to the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
For God <S%G2316><s%> is not the author of confusion, <S%G181><s%> but of peace, <S%G1515><s%> as in all <S%G3956><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

Let your <S%G5216><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> keep <S%G4601><s%> silence <S%G4601><s%> in the churches: <S%G1577><s%> for it is not permitted <S%G2010><s%> to them to speak; <S%G2980><s%> but they are commanded to be under <S%G5293><s%> obedience <S%G5293><s%>as also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> they will <S%G2309><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing, let them ask <S%G1905><s%> their husbands <S%G435><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> home: <S%G3624><s%> for it is a shame <S%G149><s%> for women <S%G1135><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> in the church. <S%G1577><s%>
What? <S%G2228><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> out from you? or <S%G2228><s%> came <S%G2658><s%> it to you only? <S%G3441><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man think <S%G1380><s%> himself to be a prophet, <S%G4396><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> spiritual, <S%G4152><s%> let him acknowledge <S%G1921><s%> that the things that I write <S%G1125><s%> to you are the commandments <S%G1785><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
But if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man be ignorant, <S%G50><s%> let him be ignorant. <S%G50><s%>
Why, <S%G5620><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> covet <S%G2206><s%> to prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> and forbid <S%G2967><s%> not to speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues. <S%G1100><s%>
Let all <S%G3956><s%> things be done <S%G1096><s%> decently <S%G2156><s%> and in order. <S%G5010><s%>
